00008 EnvironmentAndRigidBody::EnvironmentAndRigidBody()
00009 {
00010     //create params from config
00011     SimulationParameters::initialiseEnvironment
00012                             (
00013                                 m_obstacleEnabled,
00014                                 m_boundaryPosition,
00015                                 m_boundaryDimension,
00016                                 m_boundaryRestitutionCoefficientForFluid,
00017                                 m_sphereRBDList,
00018                                 m_rbdSphereRestitutionCoefficient,
00019                                 m_boundaryColour
00020                             );
00021 
00022     //create bbox for boundary
00023     m_boundaryBBox = new ngl::BBox(m_boundaryPosition, m_boundaryDimension.m_x, m_boundaryDimension.m_y, m_boundaryDimension.m_z);
00024 }

00035 void EnvironmentAndRigidBody::checkCollision (
00036                                                 Particle& io_fluidParticle
00037                                              )
00038 {
00039     if (m_obstacleEnabled)
00040     {
00041         BOOST_FOREACH(Particle& rbdSphere, m_sphereRBDList)
00042         {
00043                 /*-------Check Collisions against Rigid Body Spheres--------------------*/
00044                 checkAndSolveCollisionWithRBDSphere(io_fluidParticle, rbdSphere);
00045         }
00046      }
00047     /*-----------Check Collision against the Boundry Box------------------*/
00048     checkAndSolveCollisionWithBoundary(io_fluidParticle);
00049 }
00050 
00051 void EnvironmentAndRigidBody::checkAndSolveCollisionWithRBDSphere
00052                         (
00053                             Particle& io_fluidParticle,
00054                             Particle& _rbdSphere
00055                         )
00056 {
00057 
00058     ngl::Real restitutionCoefficient = m_rbdSphereRestitutionCoefficient;
00059     //initialise variables
00060     ngl::Vector X = io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition();
00061     ngl::Vector C = _rbdSphere.getCurrentPosition();
00062     ngl::Vector XC = X - C;
00063     ngl::Vector CX = C - X;
00064 
00065     ngl::Real r = io_fluidParticle.getCollisionRadius() + _rbdSphere.getCollisionRadius();
00066 
00067     //calculate implicit function value for a sphere
00068     ngl::Real Fx = XC.lengthSquared() - (r * r);
00069 
00070     if (Fx < 0)
00071     {
00072         //calculate contact point
00073         ngl::Vector CP = C + (r * (XC / XC.length()));
00074 
00075         //calculate normal
00076         ngl::Vector n = (Fx < 0 ? -1 : Fx == 0 ? 0 : 1) * (CX / CX.length());
00077 
00078         io_fluidParticle.updatePosition(CP);
00079 
00080         ngl::Real dot = n.dot(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity());
00081 
00082         ngl::Vector vel = io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity() - ((1.0 + restitutionCoefficient) * dot * n);
00083 
00084         io_fluidParticle.updateVelocity(vel);
00085     }
00086 }
00087 
00088 void EnvironmentAndRigidBody::checkAndSolveCollisionWithBoundary
00089                         (
00090                             Particle& io_fluidParticle
00091                         )
00092 {
00093 
00094     //determine bounds of box
00095     ngl::Real xMax = m_boundaryBBox->center().m_x + (m_boundaryBBox->width()/2.0f);
00096     ngl::Real xMin = m_boundaryBBox->center().m_x - (m_boundaryBBox->width()/2.0f);
00097     ngl::Real yMax = m_boundaryBBox->center().m_y + (m_boundaryBBox->height()/2.0f);
00098     ngl::Real yMin = m_boundaryBBox->center().m_y - (m_boundaryBBox->height()/2.0f);
00099     ngl::Real zMax = m_boundaryBBox->center().m_z + (m_boundaryBBox->depth()/2.0f);
00100     ngl::Real zMin = m_boundaryBBox->center().m_z - (m_boundaryBBox->depth()/2.0f);
00101 
00102     //move bounds closer due to difference in particle radius
00103 
00104     xMax -= io_fluidParticle.getCollisionRadius();
00105     xMin += io_fluidParticle.getCollisionRadius();
00106     yMax -= io_fluidParticle.getCollisionRadius();
00107     yMin += io_fluidParticle.getCollisionRadius();
00108     zMax -= io_fluidParticle.getCollisionRadius();
00109     zMin += io_fluidParticle.getCollisionRadius();
00110 
00111     //get position of particle
00112     ngl::Vector currentPosition = io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition();
00113 
00114     ngl::Real restitutionCoefficient = m_boundaryRestitutionCoefficientForFluid;
00115 
00116     if (currentPosition.m_x > xMax)
00117     {
00118         //set position to boundary edge
00119         io_fluidParticle.updatePosition(ngl::Vector(xMax, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition().m_y, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition().m_z));
00120 
00121         //calculate new velocity (reflect on face normal with restitution factor
00122         io_fluidParticle.updateVelocity(ngl::Vector(-restitutionCoefficient * io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_x, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_y, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_z));
00123 
00124     }
00125     if (currentPosition.m_x < xMin)
00126     {
00127         //set position to boundary edge
00128         io_fluidParticle.updatePosition(ngl::Vector(xMin, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition().m_y, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition().m_z));
00129 
00130         //calculate new velocity (reflect on face normal with restitution factor
00131         io_fluidParticle.updateVelocity(ngl::Vector(-restitutionCoefficient * io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_x, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_y, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_z));
00132     }
00133     if (currentPosition.m_y > yMax)
00134     {
00135         //set position to boundary edge
00136         io_fluidParticle.updatePosition(ngl::Vector(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition().m_x, yMax, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition().m_z));
00137 
00138         //calculate new velocity (reflect on face normal with restitution factor
00139         io_fluidParticle.updateVelocity(ngl::Vector(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_x, -restitutionCoefficient * io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_y, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_z));
00140     }
00141     if (currentPosition.m_y < yMin)
00142     {
00143         //set position to boundary edge
00144         io_fluidParticle.updatePosition(ngl::Vector(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition().m_x, yMin, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition().m_z));
00145 
00146         //calculate new velocity (reflect on face normal with restitution factor
00147         io_fluidParticle.updateVelocity(ngl::Vector(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_x, -restitutionCoefficient * io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_y, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_z));
00148     }
00149     if (currentPosition.m_z > zMax)
00150     {
00151         io_fluidParticle.updatePosition(ngl::Vector(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition().m_x, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition().m_y, zMax));
00152 
00153         //calculate new velocity (reflect on face normal with restitution factor
00154         io_fluidParticle.updateVelocity(ngl::Vector(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_x, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_y, -restitutionCoefficient * io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_z));
00155     }
00156     if (currentPosition.m_z < zMin)
00157     {
00158         io_fluidParticle.updatePosition(ngl::Vector(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition().m_x, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition().m_y, zMin));
00159 
00160         //calculate new velocity (reflect on face normal with restitution factor
00161         io_fluidParticle.updateVelocity(ngl::Vector(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_x, io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_y, -restitutionCoefficient * io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity().m_z));
00162     }
00163 
00164 }
